prompts: Create a majestic dragon Pokemon that embodies the essence of fire and ice.
Design a mystical creature that has flowing white fur and ethereal wings.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that represents truth, with a sleek and elegant design.
Generate a dragon-like Pokemon with a long tail and a fiery aura.
Show me a unique Pokemon that has a combination of white and blue colors, symbolizing purity and power.
Make a mythical Pokemon that can soar through the skies and breathe fire.
Give me a powerful looking Pokemon that has a serene expression and a majestic presence.
